list-item.p: 0–3: Introduced species (always = 0), plus native species that occur in moderately to highly degraded sites (1–3)
4–6: Native species that show some affinity to natural areas and are often dominant or are present across a wide range of habitats and environments
7–8: Native species associated mostly with natural areas, but that can sometimes persist in degraded habitat
9–10: Native species that tolerate very little or no habitat degradation
